Splash
Hello world! Settings About \t\tAIBible is about you having a better experience with your bible.To get started just text the first three characters then the respective chapter and verse you want to read and our intelligent robot will text back the verse. \nExample John 3:16 will be joh3 6 in that specific format \n \n You can also go through random interesting Bible facts by texting "bible facts" to our bot. Lastly what would be a chat bot if you cant talk to it.Just say hi and hell hold a conversation with you
